Skincare for fair and dark people is similar. Cleanse to remove impurities e.g Dove moisturising soap
Moisturise which means use body 'cream' that is not a bleaching cream- Dove, Cerave, Topicrem, Vaseline, St Ives amongst others.
Use a sunscreen with SPF of 30 to 50
